section1.title: What is MirrorBuddy
section1.content1: MirrorBuddy is a free app that uses artificial intelligence to help children and teenagers study.
section1.content2: It's a project of the FightTheStroke Foundation, created by people who want to make learning more accessible to everyone.

section2.title: What we promise
section2.item1: Do our best to create a useful tool
section2.item3: Listen to your feedback and improve
section2.item4: Be transparent about how it works

school.heading: We're not a school
school.content: MirrorBuddy helps with studying, but it doesn't replace teachers and schools.

ai.heading: AI can make mistakes
ai.content: Artificial intelligence is good but not perfect. Always check important answers with an adult or a book.

beta.heading: It's a free beta service
beta.content: We do our best, but the service might not always work or it might change.

section4.title: AI Professors
section4.intro: MirrorBuddy includes virtual professors inspired by historical and contemporary figures. Here's what you should know:

educational.heading: Purely educational purpose
educational.content: AI professors are created exclusively for educational and demonstration purposes. They do not represent real people and are not affiliated with or endorsed by them.

changeable.heading: Professors can change
changeable.content: The list of available professors may vary over time. Some may be replaced or removed.

demo.heading: Demonstration version
demo.content: This version serves to demonstrate the platform's capabilities. In the future, each student will be able to create their own custom professors, freely choosing names and avatars.

section5.title: If something goes wrong
section5.intro: MirrorBuddy is free and made with love. We can't be responsible if:
section5.item1: The AI gives a wrong answer
section5.item2: The service doesn't work for a while
section5.item3: You don't pass an exam (studying is still essential!)
section5.item4: Something happens while you use the app
section5.note: This doesn't mean we don't care - we care deeply! But legally we need to protect ourselves to continue helping.

section6.title: We ask you to...
section6.intro: To make everything work well, we ask you to:

respect.label: Use MirrorBuddy with respect
respect.content: towards the app and towards others

noAbuse.label: Don't try to "cheat" the AI
noAbuse.content: don't make it say bad or dangerous things

report.label: Report problems to us
report.content: if something's wrong, let us know: info@fightthestroke.org

section7.title: For parents and guardians

supervise.label: We ask you to supervise
supervise.content: stay nearby while they use the app

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies
whatAreCookies.p1: Cookies are small text files that websites save on your device (computer, phone, tablet). They help remember useful information, like whether you've already logged in.
whatAreCookies.p2: Think of cookies like sticky notes that the website leaves on your browser to remember you.

whichCookies.title: Which cookies we use
whichCookies.intro: MirrorBuddy uses only two types of cookies
whichCookies.essentialDesc: needed to make the app work
whichCookies.analyticsDesc: help us understand if the app works well
whichCookies.disclaimer: We NEVER use advertising cookies. Never. We have no ads.

essentialCookies.title: Essential cookies
essentialCookies.intro: These cookies are necessary to use MirrorBuddy. You can't disable them because without them the app wouldn't work.
essentialCookies.note: The authentication cookie uses HMAC-SHA256 signature to prevent tampering. The httpOnly flag protects against unauthorized JavaScript access.

metricsAnalytics.title: Metrics and analytics
metricsAnalytics.p1: MirrorBuddy doesn't use third-party analytics cookies. Your cookie preferences are saved in the browser (localStorage), not in a cookie.
metricsAnalytics.p2: We collect technical metrics (Web Vitals) to understand if the app works well. These metrics are
metricsAnalytics.serverSideDesc: no analytics cookies installed on your browser
metricsAnalytics.gdprCompliantDesc: data processed according to Privacy Policy

aiSystem.section1Title: What does AI do in MirrorBuddy?
aiSystem.section1Para1: MirrorBuddy uses artificial intelligence (AI) to provide a personalized educational experience. The 22 AI Maestri (virtual tutors) are designed to teach, explain difficult concepts, create quizzes, mind maps, and flashcards.
aiSystem.section1Para2Item1: AI does NOT decide your grade
aiSystem.section1Para2Conclusion: Teachers remain always the primary responsible for evaluation and pedagogical decisions.
aiSystem.section2Para1: MirrorBuddy uses Azure OpenAI (GPT-4), a state-of-the-art language model developed by OpenAI and hosted in Microsoft's European data centers.
aiSystem.section2List1Text: When you ask a question, the model analyzes the text and generates a response based on its training
aiSystem.section2List2Text: The 22 Maestri have embedded knowledge bases - controlled and expert-verified knowledge libraries - that limit what they can say
aiSystem.section2List3Text: Each response can be reviewed by teachers and parents through the control dashboard
aiSystem.section3Para1: MirrorBuddy has 22 virtual tutors specialized in different subjects. Each Maestro has an authentic personality and verified knowledge in their field.
aiSystem.section3Cat4Items: Leonardo (Art), Mozart (Music), Hippocrates (Health), Chris (Physical Education), Simone (Sport)
aiSystem.section3Para2: Each Maestro has a unique voice (both text and audio), personalized teaching style, and can access tools like quizzes, flashcards, mind maps, and PDFs to teach effectively.
aiSystem.section4Item1Text: You'll always know when you're talking to an AI. A banner reminds you in every chat.
aiSystem.section4Item2Text: Teachers and parents see all your chats and can intervene at any time
aiSystem.section4Item3Text: The AI will never generate violent, explicit, or age-inappropriate content
aiSystem.section4Item4Text: You have a daily budget of AI interactions to prevent dependence and maintain focus
aiSystem.section4Item5Text: Both you and your parents must approve AI use

faqSupport.section9Para1: If you have concerns about how MirrorBuddy uses AI, contact us:
faqSupport.section9AuthorityText: You can also contact the Privacy Guarantor directly (www.garanteprivacy.it)
faqSupport.section9Para2: We respond to all complaints within 30 business days.
faqSupport.faq1Question: Does AI read my chats with my friends?
faqSupport.faq1Answer: No. AI only sees chats that happen within MirrorBuddy when you talk to Maestri. Your private conversations outside MirrorBuddy remain private.
faqSupport.faq2Question: Can I delete my chats with Maestri?
faqSupport.faq2Answer: Yes. You can delete individual chats from your dashboard. If you want to delete everything, you can request the "right to be forgotten" through the compliance email.
faqSupport.faq3Question: Does AI know my diagnoses (dyslexia, ADHD, etc.)?
faqSupport.faq3Answer: Only if you choose to share them in your profile. MirrorBuddy does not automatically collect medical diagnoses, but Maestri can personalize teaching if they know your learning needs.
faqSupport.faq4Question: What happens if AI makes a mistake?
faqSupport.faq4Answer: Report it to your teacher, who can mark the response as incorrect. This helps improve the Maestro. Additionally, teachers can always correct or supplement the AI's explanation.
faqSupport.faq5Question: How can I refuse to use AI?
faqSupport.faq5Answer: Go to account settings and disable "Use AI Maestri". You'll still have access to all other MirrorBuddy tools (resources, notes, etc.), and can talk directly with your teachers.
faqSupport.section11Para1: This page is updated with the latest AI compliance information. Check periodically for any changes in the systems used or regulations.

rightsCompliance.section5Para1: According to Italian law (Law 132/2025) and GDPR, you have the right to:
rightsCompliance.section5Item1Text: Always be informed when an automated system generates responses
rightsCompliance.section5Item2Text: Receive clear explanations of how the AI Maestro chooses to respond
rightsCompliance.section5Item3Text: You can choose to speak only with human teachers, without losing platform access
rightsCompliance.section5Item4Text: Request a copy of all your chats, feedback, and data that AI has processed about you
rightsCompliance.section5Item5Text: If a piece of data is inaccurate, you can request it be corrected or deleted
rightsCompliance.section5Item6Text: If you think AI isn't respecting your rights, you can report the issue
rightsCompliance.section6Para1: All data you share with Maestri is protected as required by GDPR (European privacy law):
rightsCompliance.section6Item1Text: Data is encrypted both when it travels (in transit) and when stored on servers
rightsCompliance.section6Item2Text: Your data is NEVER sold to third parties or used for advertising
rightsCompliance.section6Item3Text: Only MirrorBuddy and Microsoft (who hosts the servers) can access the data
rightsCompliance.section6Item4Text: Data is kept only as long as necessary for education
rightsCompliance.section6Item5Text: You can request that all your data be deleted
rightsCompliance.section7Title: Risks and How We Manage Them
rightsCompliance.section7Para1: Like any AI, there are some risks. Here's how we address them:
rightsCompliance.section7Risk5Mitigation: Daily budget, parental controls, opt-out option
rightsCompliance.section8Para1: MirrorBuddy complies with the following European and Italian regulations:
rightsCompliance.section8Item1Text: European regulation on high-risk AI in education and child protection
rightsCompliance.section8Item2Text: Italian implementation of the AI Act with user rights and provider responsibilities
rightsCompliance.section8Item3Text: Protection of personal data and privacy
rightsCompliance.section8Para2: MirrorBuddy is classified as a high-risk AI system because it supports the learning of minors with cognitive difficulties. Consequently, we implement strict measures for transparency, oversight, and protection.
